survey_name: Post-Event Feedback Survey for Corporate Conferences
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather attendee feedback to evaluate the effectiveness, organization, and overall experience of the recent corporate conference.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the list covers all major sessions. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable takeaway from the conference for you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Limit response to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-ended question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable takeaway from the conference for you?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend next year's conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend next year's conference?

questions.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving future conferences?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture constructive feedback. Limit response to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-ended question with a text input field.

script.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving future conferences?
